CCUploadForm

class CCUploadForm extends CCForm
include cc-form.php
Derived classes: CCContestForm, CCUploadMediaForm, CCUserProfileForm
Short Desc.: Sets up an HTML form that is capable of receiving file uploads.
Description: Derive from this class when your form has file upload fields. It has built in support avatar images.
CCUploadForm ()
Short Desc.: Constructor
Description: Setups the template to handle file uploads.
FinalizeAvatarUpload (
string $fieldname , Name of the HTML field
string $imagedir Directory to put the uploaded image into
)
Short Desc.: Avatar upload is not completed until this helper is called.
Description: This method should be called (after field verification) to move the uploaded to the right location. It requires that the field information array contains an entry called 'upload_dir' is the local directory (relative, not full path) that is to receive the image upload.
generator_avatar (
string $varname , Name of the HTML field
string $value = '', Image file name (optional)
string $class = '' CSS class (ignored)
)
Short Desc.: Handles generation of HTML field for avatars.
Description: Generates HTML for displaying browse field and (if the image exists) a thumbnail of the image and a 'delete this' check box. It requires that the field information array contains an entry called 'upload_dir' is the local directory (relative, not full path) that is to receive the image upload. This method is called automatically from CCForm::GenerateForm()
generator_upload (
string $varname , Name of the HTML field
string $value = '', (ignored)
string $class = '' CSS class (optional)
)
Short Desc.: Handles generation of HTML field for simple file uploads.
Description: Generates HTML for displaying browse field. This method is called automatically from CCForm::GenerateForm()
validator_avatar (
string $fieldname Name of the HTML field
)
Short Desc.: Validates HTML field for avatars at POST time.
Description: Checks for such things as 'required' flags. Also checks against an ield information array about maximum height/width requirements. Generates HTML for displaying browse field and (if the image exists). This method is called automatically from CCForm::ValidateFields()
validator_upload (
string $fieldname Name of the HTML field
)
Short Desc.: Validates HTML field for file uploads at POST time.
Description: Checks for such things as 'required' flags. Also checks against PHP system errors on upload. If successful will populate the the 'value' field of the fields info array with the name of the target file and creates an entry called 'fileobj' that contains a copy of the PHP $_FILES object for this field. This method is called automatically from CCForm::ValidateFields()
